mount.name: Prized Tame Redhorn-goat
mount.description: The Iron Garrison Miners have been training Redhorn mountain-goats to use as mounts. These sure-footed creatures can traverse the rocky passageways of Moria where no horse could go. This is one of their tame goats, making it not as fast as others.
mount.sourceDescription: Available for barter from the Iron Garrison Miners reputation barterers.

mount.name: Steed of Night
mount.description: Black as the night, this unique looking pony has 250 Morale and is as fast as a reputation mount. The pony has the added benefit of not knocking you off immediately when critically hit by an attacker.

mount.name: War-steed: Medium
mount.description: The Rouncey is a moderately armoured War-steed. The Rouncey provides balance and stability without sacrificing or favouring survivability or maneuverability.

mount.name: War-steed: Light
mount.description: The Courser is a lightly armoured War-steed. Fast and agile, the Courser provides the greatest speed and maneuverability on the battlefield, trading Endurance and Armour to retain their nimbleness.

mount.name: War-steed: Heavy
